nodes.text: The LucasArts Star Wars Cantina is a space created by LucasArts for the PlayStation 3's virtual 3D social gaming network PlayStation Home. A recreation of the Mos Eisley Cantina, the LucasArts Cantina acts as a hub from which players can converse, view posters and videos, and access LucasArts related avatar items featuring Star Wars, Indiana Jones and Monkey Island.
